title: Finley's Adoration
description: I knew love would make me go to dangerous lengths, but now it's taken me this far.FinleyI'd do anything for her and that much has always been true. Even from the moment we met I knew there was something more between us. Now we're here, have a son, and we're living our lives.Though, it doesn't mean anything will be easy. We're facing threats on multiple accounts, from her biker club to my business.Nothing will take Ainslee from me, and I'll go to great lengths to keep her safe. She's my adoration and I'll spill blood if I have to.
author: Elizabeth   Knox
